comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Albanian Army, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 49854959@N05
comment._content: Albania is the "mystery" country of Europe.  The ancient skirt and the much more recent trouser are both in evidence, showing again the fact of these distinct adaptations having no real link to gender.  Those in pants were more likely to have had horses, as trousers are equestrian in origin, more so than arctic.

comment._content: very, very interesting collection! thanks for uploading such valorous photos.
